definition: to give no thought to/to have no regard for/to disregard
to install/to place/to put/to buy
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it
to estimate/Taiwan pr. [duo4]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
outside/in addition/foreign/external

sentences.english: All that is now behind me.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我要把這一切都置之度外。

sentences.english: The firefighters showed contempt for their own safety.
sentences.chinese: 那些消防隊員把他們自己的安全置之度外。

sentences.english: He seemed careless of his own safety.
sentences.chinese: 他彷彿已把自己的安危置之度外。
他已將一切置之度外了。

sentences.english: She can shrug off her troubles and keep smiling.
sentences.chinese: 她能夠把煩惱置之度外而依舊保持笑容。

sentences.english: Experts expect to throw away some early work.
sentences.chinese: 專家們希望把自己的早期作品置之度外。

sentences.english: And fighting makes it nearly impossible to rethink land ownership or management.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭更使得土地的所有權和管理被置之度外。

sentences.english: He who sees through life and death will meet with most success.
sentences.chinese: 譯〕把生死置之度外者，大多會成功。

sentences.english: For the revolutionary cause many martyrs left life and death out of consideration.
sentences.chinese: 革命先烈爲了革命事業把生死置之度外。

definition: life or death
honor and disgrace/reputation
outside the sphere of one's consideration
to give up life for righteousness (idiom, from Mencius); to choose honor over life/would rather sacrifice one's life than one's principles
to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
to hold on firmly/to cling (to a belief)/stubbornly
safety and danger/safety
critical circumstances/risky conditions/danger zone
life
to meet death
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
the critical moment/life and death crisis
position and wealth (idiom); rank, fame and fortune
to place sb on field of death/to confront with mortal danger/to give sb no way out/with one's back to the wall/looking death in the eye/part of idiom 置之死地而後生|置之死地而后生
to live or die/to exist or perish
utterly fearless
